LanguageData.EtherRatiteLeg.stagePatches.1.values.des: The bones in [PAWN_nameDef]'s leg are growing longer or shorter as need be. It will be rather difficult and painful to move while this change is taking place.
LanguageData.EtherRatiteLeg.stagePatches.2.values.des: [PAWN_nameDef]'s legs have reshaped into very large avian legs. They are incredibly powerful, but look strange on a humanoid. [PAWN_pronoun] will need some time to get used to the new shape.
LanguageData.EtherRatiteLeg.stagePatches.3.values.des: [PAWN_nameDef]'s legs have reshaped into very large avian legs. They are incredibly powerful, but look strange on a humanoid.
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stages.0.label: initial
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stages.1.label: readjusting
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stages.2.label: adapting
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stages.3.label: adapted
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.label: spring-loaded leg
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stagePatches.0.values.label: itching
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stagePatches.0.values.descr: [PAWN_nameDef]'s leg has started itching quite a lot, but nothing serious yet.
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stagePatches.1.values.descr: The bones in [PAWN_nameDef]'s leg are growing longer or shorter as need be. It will be rather difficult and painful to move while this change is taking place.
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stagePatches.2.values.descr: [PAWN_nameDef]'s legs have reshaped to look something like a rabbit's. This helps them run away from predators, but good luck finding pants that fit. [PAWN_pronoun] will need some time to get used to the new shape.
LanguageData.EtherHareLeg.stagePatches.3.values.descr: [PAWN_nameDef]'s legs have reshaped to look something like a rabbit's. This helps them run away from predators, but good luck finding pants that fit.
LanguageData.EtherEarHole.stagePatches.1.values.descr: [PAWN_nameDef] no longer has a visible ear.
LanguageData.EtherEarHole.stagePatches.2.values.descr: [PAWN_nameDef]'s ear looks more and more like an animal ear hole.
LanguageData.EtherEarHole.label: ear hole
LanguageData.EtherEarHole.stagePatches.1.values.label: missing
LanguageData.EtherUdder.label: udder
LanguageData.EtherUdder.stages.0.description: This really needs no explanation. [PAWN_nameDef] now produces milk.
LanguageData.EtherStrongHeart.description: This heart is built for a larger body, and pumps a lot of blood. It also tires people out.
LanguageData.EtherStrongHeart.label: strong heart
LanguageData.EtherStrongHeart.stagePatches.0.values.d: Strong pulses are going through [PAWN_nameDef]'s chest. They are getting worse and worse.
LanguageData.EtherStrongHeart.stagePatches.1.values.d: A painful spasm of a growing heart is burning in [PAWN_nameDef]'s chest.
LanguageData.EtherStrongHeart.stagePatches.2.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef]'s heart has grown in size and the surrounding chest cavity has expanded to make room. [PAWN_pronoun] will need to rest more often, however.
LanguageData.EtherBellowingLung.description: A large, powerful lung for intensive breathing.
LanguageData.EtherBellowingLung.label: bellowing lung
LanguageData.EtherBellowingLung.stagePatches.0.values: Breathing is becoming more and more difficult for [PAWN_nameDef] as [PAWN_pronoun]'s lung has started to expand.
LanguageData.EtherBellowingLung.stagePatches.1.values: A painful spasm of a growing lung is burning in [PAWN_nameDef]'s chest.
LanguageData.EtherBellowingLung.stagePatches.2.values: [PAWN_nameDef]'s lung has grown in size and the surrounding chest cavity has expanded to make room. The larger size leads to hyperventilation, causing slight dizziness.
LanguageData.EtherBellowingLung.stages.0.label: paragon
LanguageData.EtherBellowingLung.stages.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s lung has acquired a reinforced voicebox that can focus [PAWN_nameDef]'s breath into a roar capable of terrifying and overloading mechanical auditory sensors.
LanguageData.EtherExpandedCerabellum.description: An expanded frontal lobe for bright morphs.
LanguageData.EtherExpandedCerabellum.label: expanded frontal lobe
LanguageData.EtherExpandedCerabellum.stagePatches.0.v: [PAWN_nameDef] is recently having more headaches than usual.
LanguageData.EtherExpandedCerabellum.stagePatches.1.v: [PAWN_nameDef]'s having a painful, constant migraine. It feels like [PAWN_nameDef]'s brain is expandiing.
LanguageData.EtherExpandedCerabellum.stagePatches.2.v: [PAWN_nameDef]'s frontal lobe has expanded. With these new connections, many problems are now trivial for [PAWN_nameDef].
LanguageData.EtherExpandedCerabellum.stages.0.label: paragon
LanguageData.EtherExpandedCerabellum.stages.0.descrip: [PAWN_nameDef]'s enhanced brain is so adept at logical problem solving [PAWN_objective] can solve differential equations on the fly, calculating ballistics trajectories is a comparatively simple matter.
LanguageData.EtherIronStomach.description: A stomach which is resilient to most germs.
LanguageData.EtherIronStomach.label: iron stomach
LanguageData.EtherIronStomach.stagePatches.0.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef]'s stomach is sometimes hurting a bit after eating. Nothing too worrying though.
LanguageData.EtherIronStomach.stagePatches.1.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef] seems to have painful disgestion troubles, like if [PAWN_possessive] gut was evolving.
LanguageData.EtherIronStomach.stagePatches.2.values.d: [PAWN_nameDef]'s gut is now resilient to dangerous and rotten food, and [PAWN_nameDef] could eat almost everything.
LanguageData.EtherLightFurredLimb.stagePatches.0.valu: [PAWN_nameDef]'s skin seems to be slightly hairier than it was before.
LanguageData.EtherLightFurredLimb.stagePatches.1.valu: Very fine fur too dense to be hair is sprouting over [PAWN_nameDef]'s limb.
LanguageData.EtherLightFurredLimb.stagePatches.2.valu: The fur on the skin here is quickly thickening as it spreads over [PAWN_nameDef]'s limb.
LanguageData.EtherLightFurredLimb.stagePatches.3.valu: This limb has been entirely covered by a coat of light fur.
LanguageData.EtherLightFurredLimb.stagePatches.4.valu: Fur has covered the entirety of [PAWN_nameDef]'s limb, giving it a soft fine coat that helps retaining warmth.
LanguageData.EtherLightFurredLimb.label: light fur
LanguageData.EtherFurredLimb.stagePatches.0.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s skin seems to be slightly hairier than it was before.
LanguageData.EtherFurredLimb.stagePatches.1.values.de: Very fine fur too dense to be hair is sprouting over [PAWN_nameDef]'s limb.
LanguageData.EtherFurredLimb.stagePatches.2.values.de: The fur on the skin here is quickly thickening as it spreads over [PAWN_nameDef]'s limb.
LanguageData.EtherFurredLimb.stagePatches.3.values.de: There is not much bare skin left on [PAWN_nameDef]'s limb, much of it has been covered by patches of fur.
LanguageData.EtherFurredLimb.stagePatches.4.values.de: Fur has covered the entirety of [PAWN_nameDef]'s limb, giving it a soft fine coat that helps retaining warmth.
LanguageData.EtherFurredLimb.label: fur
LanguageData.EtherArcticFurredLimb.stagePatches.0.val: [PAWN_nameDef]'s skin seems to be slightly hairier than it was before.
LanguageData.EtherArcticFurredLimb.stagePatches.1.val: Very fine fur too dense to be hair is sprouting over [PAWN_nameDef]'s limb.
LanguageData.EtherArcticFurredLimb.stagePatches.2.val: The fur on the skin here is quickly thickening as it spreads over [PAWN_nameDef]'s limb.
LanguageData.EtherArcticFurredLimb.stagePatches.3.val: This limb has been entirely covered by a thick coat of arctic-proof fur.
LanguageData.EtherArcticFurredLimb.stagePatches.4.val: Fur has covered the entirety of [PAWN_nameDef]'s limb, giving it a soft fine coat that helps retaining warmth.
LanguageData.EtherArcticFurredLimb.label: arctic fur
LanguageData.EtherDenseFurredLimb.stagePatches.0.valu: [PAWN_nameDef]'s skin seems to be slightly hairier than it was before.
LanguageData.EtherDenseFurredLimb.stagePatches.1.valu: Very fine fur too dense to be hair is sprouting over [PAWN_nameDef]'s limb.
LanguageData.EtherDenseFurredLimb.stagePatches.2.valu: The fur on the skin here is quickly thickening as it spreads over [PAWN_nameDef]'s limb.
LanguageData.EtherDenseFurredLimb.stagePatches.3.valu: A thick and dense coat of fur covers this limb. It'll need a lot of brushing to keep it neat and tidy.
LanguageData.EtherDenseFurredLimb.stagePatches.4.valu: Fur has covered the entirety of [PAWN_nameDef]'s limb, giving it a soft fine coat that helps retaining warmth.
LanguageData.EtherDenseFurredLimb.label: dense fur
LanguageData.EtherThrumboFurredLimb.stagePatches.0.va: [PAWN_nameDef]'s skin seems to be slightly hairier than it was before.
LanguageData.EtherThrumboFurredLimb.stagePatches.1.va: Very fine fur too dense to be hair is sprouting over [PAWN_nameDef]'s limb.
LanguageData.EtherThrumboFurredLimb.stagePatches.2.va: The fur on the skin here is quickly thickening as it spreads over [PAWN_nameDef]'s limb.
LanguageData.EtherThrumboFurredLimb.stagePatches.3.va: Beautiful white fur coats this limb, thick and long. It could even be braided, if [PAWN_pronoun] was willing.
LanguageData.EtherThrumboFurredLimb.stagePatches.4.va: Fur has covered the entirety of [PAWN_nameDef]'s limb, giving it a soft fine coat that helps retaining warmth.
LanguageData.EtherThrumboFurredLimb.label: thumbo fur
LanguageData.EtherHideLimb.stagePatches.0.values.desc: The skin on this limb seems to be slightly more tough than the average human.
LanguageData.EtherHideLimb.stagePatches.1.values.desc: The skin on this limb seems to be quite a bit tougher than the average human.
LanguageData.EtherHideLimb.stagePatches.2.values.desc: Rough, thick bristles have sprouted from this limb as the skin grows thicker.
LanguageData.EtherHideLimb.stagePatches.3.values.desc: The skin on this limb is greatly thicker than an average human, and is covered in thick bristles.
LanguageData.EtherHideLimb.stagePatches.4.values.desc: A leathery hide has formed over this limb, adding some natural defense.
LanguageData.EtherHideLimb.label: hide
LanguageData.EtherThickHideLimb.stagePatches.0.values: The skin on this limb seems to be slightly more tough than the average human.
LanguageData.EtherThickHideLimb.stagePatches.1.values: The skin on this limb seems to be quite a bit tougher than the average human.
LanguageData.EtherThickHideLimb.stagePatches.2.values: Rough, thick bristles have sprouted from this limb as the skin grows thicker.
LanguageData.EtherThickHideLimb.stagePatches.3.values: A very thick, rough and leathery skin now covers this limb, adding a substantial natural defense.
LanguageData.EtherThickHideLimb.stagePatches.4.values: A leathery hide has formed over this limb, adding some natural defense.
LanguageData.EtherThickHideLimb.label: thick hide
LanguageData.EtherReptileScaledLimb.stagePatches.0.va: All of [PAWN_nameDef]'s hair on this part has started to fall out, and [PAWN_pronoun]'s skin itches severely.
LanguageData.EtherReptileScaledLimb.stagePatches.1.va: [PAWN_nameDef]'s skin in this limb has become drier, and is fragmenting into sprouts of scales.
LanguageData.EtherReptileScaledLimb.stagePatches.2.va: The sprouts in this limb have grown into hard clusters of rough scales, allowing [PAWN_nameDef] to disperse heat from the body.
LanguageData.EtherReptileScaledLimb.stagePatches.3.va: The clusters are spreading even more through the skin, almost covering all the [PAWN_nameDef]'s limb
LanguageData.EtherReptileScaledLimb.stagePatches.4.va: [PAWN_nameDef]'s skin in this limb has turned into a layer of scales
LanguageData.EtherReptileScaledLimb.label: scales
LanguageData.EtherFeatheredLimb.stagePatches.0.values: This limb appears to be covered in gooseumps as prickles of feathery quills are poking through the skin in places.
LanguageData.EtherFeatheredLimb.stagePatches.1.values: Quills have begun to develop feathers in patches over the skin here.
LanguageData.EtherFeatheredLimb.stagePatches.2.values: [PAWN_nameDef]'s skin looks like a moulting chicken, with patchy sections of feathers contrasting with [PAWN_possessive] skin.
LanguageData.EtherFeatheredLimb.stagePatches.3.values: Much of the skin here is covered in feathers, needing to be preened and attended to with the occassional dust bath.
LanguageData.EtherFeatheredLimb.stagePatches.4.values: The skin here is entirely covered in feathers, needing to be preened and attended to with the occassional dust bath.
LanguageData.EtherFeatheredLimb.label: feathers
LanguageData.EtherWoollyLimb.label: wool
LanguageData.EtherWoollyLimb.stagePatches.0.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s skin seems to be slightly hairier than it was before.
LanguageData.EtherWoollyLimb.stagePatches.1.values.de: The hair on the skin here is quickly thickening as it spreads over [PAWN_nameDef]'s limb.
LanguageData.EtherWoollyLimb.stagePatches.2.values.de: There is not much bare skin left on [PAWN_nameDef]'s limb, much of it has been covered by patches of fur.
LanguageData.EtherWoollyLimb.stagePatches.3.values.de: The fur has become denser on [PAWN_nameDef]'s limb, making the skin underneath hard to see...and it seems more like wool.
LanguageData.EtherWoollyLimb.stagePatches.4.values.de: The wool covers [PAWN_nameDef]'s limb entirely. It's rather warm.
LanguageData.EtherFlexibleSpine.label: flexible spine
LanguageData.EtherFlexibleSpine.stagePatches.0.values: [PAWN_nameDef]'s back hurts a bit. Nothing too bad.
LanguageData.EtherFlexibleSpine.stagePatches.1.values: [PAWN_nameDef] has difficulties controlling [PAWN_possessive] balance. It hurts whenever [PAWN_pronoun] is moving.
LanguageData.EtherFlexibleSpine.stagePatches.2.values: [PAWN_nameDef]'s spine has become flexible. [PAWN_pronoun] would likely win a contortion contest.
LanguageData.EtherReinforcedSpine.label: reinforced spine
LanguageData.EtherReinforcedSpine.stagePatches.0.valu: [PAWN_nameDef]'s back hurts a bit. Nothing too bad.
LanguageData.EtherReinforcedSpine.stagePatches.1.valu: [PAWN_nameDef]'s back is very painful, like if [PAWN_possessive]'s spine was rearranging.
LanguageData.EtherReinforcedSpine.stagePatches.2.valu: [PAWN_nameDef]'s spine is stronger than ever. [PAWN_pronoun] is now able to carry a lot, and fast!
LanguageData.EtherDromedaryHump.label: hump
LanguageData.EtherDromedaryHump.stagePatches.0.values: [PAWN_nameDef] has a strange ache in their back. Nothing too bad though.
LanguageData.EtherDromedaryHump.stagePatches.1.values: Reserves of fat has been diverted to [PAWN_nameDef]'s back where a noticiable hump has emerged. It'll keep [PAWN_objective] fed in a pinch.
LanguageData.EtherDromedaryHump.stagePatches.2.values: [PAWN_nameDef]'s hump has grown so that [PAWN_objective] can go days without food. The increased circulation also helps [PAWN_objective] cool off.
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseShell.description: A thick and scaled shell. The ultimate cumbersome defense on the Rimworld!
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseShell.label: tortoise shell
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseShell.stagePatches.0.values: Thick plates of bone are beginning to grow out from [PAWN_nameDef]'s chest and back.
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseShell.stagePatches.1.values: The two halves of the bone plates have formed a precursor shell around [PAWN_nameDef]'s body. It's still fragile at the moment, but thickening constantly.
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseShell.stagePatches.2.values: A thick and scaled shell for unmatched protection against predators encases [PAWN_nameDef]'s body. [PAWN_pronoun] has a strange urge to live in a sewer.
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseShell.stages.0.label: paragon
LanguageData.EtherTortoiseShell.stages.0.description: With rigorous acclimation training [PAWN_pronoun] has regained speed and dexterity beyond [PAWN_objective] could have dreamed! [PAWN_possessive] dreams to to live in a sewer and a study martial arts.
LanguageData.EtherHypermyofibrilization.description: A torso with extremely dense muscles, which is able to lift heavier objects with ease.
LanguageData.EtherHypermyofibrilization.label: hypermyofibrilization
[PAWN_nameDef]'s muscles are growing thicker by the second.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s muscles are much thicker and bulkier. They're dense with veins and raw power. Such an impressive growth is very painful.
[PAWN_nameDef] is a veritable wall of raw power and strength, owing to the powerful mutagen coursing through [PAWN_possessive] veins.
LanguageData.EtherToughTorso.description: A tough torso, capable of resisting a lot more force than the average torso.
LanguageData.EtherToughTorso.label: tough torso
LanguageData.EtherToughTorso.stagePatches.0.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s torso seems to be a little bulkier than before.
LanguageData.EtherToughTorso.stagePatches.1.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s torso is tougher and could shrug off a firm hit easily. However, the quick muscle growth is too painful for [PAWN_nameDef] to be useful yet.
LanguageData.EtherToughTorso.stagePatches.2.values.de: [PAWN_nameDef]'s torso is practically made of metal given how tough it is. [PAWN_pronoun] is a brick wall of muscle.
LanguageData.EtherDiminuativeTorso.description: A slim and quite frail torso.
LanguageData.EtherDiminuativeTorso.label: Diminutive torso
LanguageData.EtherDiminuativeTorso.stagePatches.0.val: [PAWN_nameDef]'s torso is beginning to slim and shed excess weight. Eating more doesn't seem to have any effect.
LanguageData.EtherDiminuativeTorso.stagePatches.1.val: [PAWN_nameDef]'s torso is becoming slimmer than before, making them easy to pick up. The weight draining is quite hurtful.
LanguageData.EtherDiminuativeTorso.stagePatches.2.val: [PAWN_nameDef]'s body is quite a bit slimmer than before. They'd be easy to push over in a fight, and don't stand as much of a chance in combat as before.
LanguageData.EtherPneumatizedSkeleton.label: pneumatized skeleton
[PAWN_nameDef]'s bones ache slightly. They seem to be getting somewhat lighter.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s bones are feeling lighter with every passing hour. They're slightly more fragile and are causing pain to [PAWN_nameDef].
[PAWN_nameDef]'s bones are light and maneuverable. They're denser than human bones, but contain air pockets to reduce the overall weight.
